sentences.en: A paralyzing peace has plunged the members of the Gun Club in deplorable inactivity.
sentences.cn: 无聊的和平使大炮俱乐部的会员们陷入可悲的无所事事的生活中.

sentences.en: Bartholdi found that work " deplorable " and " coarse ".
sentences.cn: 巴尔托第 发现那件作品水平太差,十分粗糙.

sentences.en: His self - reproach arose from the deplorable event in Wimpole Street.
sentences.cn: 温波尔街发生的痛心事件引起了他的内疚.

sentences.en: I have been forced to admit diverse propositions which appear somewhat deplorable.
sentences.cn: 我曾被迫承认各种各样多少有点不幸的命题.

sentences.en: It is deplorable that anyone should come between a child and its parents.
sentences.cn: 如果有人想离间孩子和父母,那将是可悲的.

sentences.en: Its deplorable peculiarity was, that it was the faintness of solitude and disuse.
sentences.cn: 却是由于孤独与废弃所导致的衰弱, 而这正是它凄惨的特色.

sentences.en: Many of them live under deplorable conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们中很多人的生活条件极其恶劣。
隆这种出于种族歧视的说法,是令人遗憾的.
像这样的胆大妄为应该受到指责.

sentences.en: The condition of this dirty room is deplorable.

sentences.en: The family lived in a deplorable slum.
sentences.cn: 那户人家住在肮脏的贫民窟.

sentences.en: The matter in your essay is excellent but the style is deplorable.
sentences.cn: 你的文章内容不错,但是文体很糟.
